DOC.brief_summary: To examine potential differential effect receive various social feedback achieve personal goal , whether oxytocin would modulate effect .
DOC.brief_title: The Role Oxytocin Modulating Effects Social Feedback Achieving Personal Goals
DOC.detailed_description: In present study , 62 healthy male participant participate double-blind , placebo-controlled experiment . Investigators aim test idea whether oxytocin would modulate subjective response receive various social reward social punishment future outcomes pursue personal goal .
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject without past current psychiatric neurological disorder . Taking oral contraceptive ; No history head injury medical psychiatric illness .
